remarks: Subtraction and addition of equals.  Almost but not exactly the same as ~ pncan3i and ~ pncan , this order happens often when applying "operations to both sides" so create a theorem specifically for it.  A deduction version of this is available as ~ pncand .  (Contributed by David A. Wheeler, 11-Oct-2018.)
statement:
pncan3oi.1 $e |- A e. CC $.
pncan3oi.2 $e |- B e. CC $.
pncan3oi $p |- ( ( A + B ) - B ) = A $.
